page.title: 04The Women's Institute.
page.content: They meet once a month in the Village Hall. Only women can join and they pay Â£4 a year to be a member. There is a special magazine called Home and Country which comes out once a month. They have talks about cookery, crafts, gardening and lots of other things. Sometimes they have a slide show. They arrange whist drives and anybody can join in sports such as tennis, badminton, golf and swimming. Winterborne Kingston W.I have a skittles team. They have a special show every year for flower arranging, crafts,cookery and potted plants. Cups are awarded to the winners. Mrs. Beryl Wellstead is the Vice President and told us all about it.
